entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy over Grand Manan Island. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
